news.title: POLYTOPIA NEWS
news.description:
Willkommen!
 Entdecke hier die aktuellsten Neuigkeiten vom Polytopia Universum!
gamemodepicker.title: GEFECHTSMODUS
tribepicker.title: WÄHLE DEINEN STAMM
tribepicker.categories.specialtribes.des: Eine Sammlung von Stämmen, von der etwas anderen Welt…
tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio: Wir arbeiten aktuell noch an diesem Stamm. Obst anbauen, Sprache und Architektur entwickeln... Dies dauert seine Zeit. Folge @Midjiwan auf Instagram oder Twitter um Neuigkeiten zu neuen Stämmen zu bekommen!
tribepicker.freetribe.description: Dieser Stamm ist kostenlos und kann nicht erworben werden, um den Multiplayer-Modus freizuschalten.
tribepicker.disabled.description: Deaktivierter Stamm. Er kann weder von dir, noch von der AI benutzt werden
tribepicker.firstplayer: Der erste Spieler muss ein Mensch sein
gamesettings.title: SPIEL SETUP
gamesettings.unlockmore: Schalte mehr Stämme frei, um gegen mehr Gegner zu spielen
gamesettings.createslot.error.info: Überprüfe deine Internetverbindung und versuche es anschließend erneut.
gamesettings.online.disabled.info: Einige Dinge müssen behoben werden, um im Multiplayermodus spielen zu können.
gamesettings.online.info: Spiele online mit deinen Freunden im Multiplayer.
gamesettings.passplay.info: Spiele offline mit deinen Freunden via Pass & Play.
gamemode.perfection.description.button: Zeige deine Fähigkeiten im klassischen 30-Runden Spielmodus.
gamemode.perfection.description: Erreiche die höchstmögliche Punktzahl, bevor die Zeit abläuft.
gamemode.perfection.win: Die Zeit ist um. Deine Taten werden ewig in Erinnerung bleiben!
gamemode.domination.description.button: Spiele ohne Zeitlimit, bis du der letzte Stamm auf der Karte bist.
gamemode.domination.description: Schieße andere Stämme auf den Mond! Es kann nur einen geben!
gamemode.domination.win: Du hast alle Stämme besiegt. Die Karte gehört dir!
gamemode.domination.loss: Deine letzte Stadt wurde erobert. Du wurdest besiegt.
gamemode.glory.description: Der erste Stamm, welcher {0} Punkte erreicht, gewinnt
gamemode.might.description: Erobere alle Hauptstädte, um zu gewinnen
gamemode.death: Deine letzte Stadt wurde erobert. Du wurdest besiegt.
world.intro.title: Mächtiger Anführer!
world.intro.text: Du wurdest auserwählt den {0} Stamm zu führen. Erkunde die Welt, erweitere dein Stamm und halte nach anderen Stämmen ausschau.
world.turn.end.question: Möchtest du deine Runde beenden?
world.turn.nomoves: Kein weiterer Zug möglich, beende deine Runde
world.turn.ready: Tippe auf speichern, wenn deine Runde vorbei ist
world.unit.veteran.progress: Noch {0}/{1} bis zum Aufstieg zum Veteranen.
world.unit.disembark.title: Verlasse {0}
world.unit.disembark.message: Dein {0} wird beim verlassen abgebaut. Möchtest du fortfahren?
world.unit.evolve: Deine Einheit ist zu einem {0} geworden!
world.unit.evolve.title: Wachstum
world.building.capture.ready: Ist nächste Runde bereit, erobert zu werden
world.building.capture.ready.title: Betrete {0}!
world.building.capture.warning: Wird nächste Runde erobert, wenn dies nicht unterbrochen wird.
world.building.capture.warning.title: {0} wird belagert!
world.attract.sanctuary: Dein Reich hat ein wildes Tier angelockt!
world.suggestion.title: Hier ist ein Tipp!
world.suggestion.disable: (Diese Vorschläge können im Menü ausgeschaltet werden)
world.road.connected.title: Neue Handelsroute!
world.road.connected.message: {0} ist nun mit deiner Hauptstadt verbunden!
world.tech.new.title: Neue Technologie!
world.tech.new.message: Du hast die Fähigkeiten der Technologie {0} entdeckt
world.reward.building: Du kannst nun {0} erschaffen! Dieses epische Monument wird deiner nächsten Stadt Ruhm und Reichtum bescheren.
world.reward.building.title: {0} wurde freigeschaltet.
tribes.xin-xi.info:
They start their journey in the dense mountains, surrounded by beautiful cherry blossom.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.imperius.info:
Huge mountains and green valleys. The {0} climate is perfect for growing fruit. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.bardur.info:
Surviving the harsh eternal winter of the {0} woods is not an easy task, but {0} seems to thrive here.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.oumaji.info:
The seemingly endless, sun blessed desert is the home of the {0} tribe.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.kickoo.info:
White sandy beaches with coconut palms. Abundance of fruit and fish. Welcome to the home of the {0}. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.hoodrick.info:
The yellow autumn leaves of the {0} woods are perfect hideouts for its peculiar mushroom stuffing inhabitants. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.luxidoor.info:
The {0} love expensive things, jewels, rare spices and exclusive ornaments. That is also why they are the most expensive tribe in Polytopia!

Their citizens lead very comfortable lives, draped in the finest purple silk. But will they survive outside the walls of their beloved capital?  

{0} starts the game with a huge walled capital.
tribes.vengir.info:
Frowned upon by the other tribes and pushed into the unpleasant wastelands. Will they tolerate this injustice or rise to fight back?  

{0} start the game with the '{1}' tech and a powerful Swordman.
tribes.zebasi.info:
{0} thrive on the warm savannah, cultivating the rich soil to provide food for their mighty population. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.zebasi.news: All profits from the Zebasi tribe is invested in solar energy projects.
tribes.aimo.info:
The tranquil and wise {0} tribe inhabits the harshest, windiest and highest mountain range of the square, where they have found inner peace by meditating in the eternal evening light. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.aquarion.info:
From the deep oceans a long lost civilization appears! Their extreme isolation has given them special aquatic abilities that are unknown to the other more human tribes.

{0} have a slightly different tech tree and have access to the unique amphibious turtle units that no other tribe can train.
tribes.quetzali.info:
The {0} tribe worship the bird gods of the red soil and live in harmony with the natural symmetry of their cubistic jungles. They are commonly seen riding huge flightless birds. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.elyrion.info:
The mysterious {0} defend their woodland homes with colorful magic and the ferocity of fire-breathing dragons! 

They regard Nature as a holy spirit and cannot hunt animals or chop down trees, instead they start the game with the unique Enchantment tech that can turn regular animals into powerful monsters.
tribes.yadakk.info:
The {0} started out as a nomadic tribe in the beautiful harsh Khalee plains. Now they are the traders of the square, connecting their empire with impressive trade routes. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.polaris.info:
The {0} have lain trapped in the far reaches of the freezing tundra for eons, but were blessed by the unknowable Gaami with the power to expand their unnatural icy terrain farther than the weather permits. 

With the might of sleds and Mamoos, the mystical {0} are determined to entomb the Square in ice and transform the land into a frigid paradise. 

{0} starts the game with the ability to freeze surrounding terrain using Moonies.
building.capital.owner.former: {0}, ehemalige Haupstadt von {1}, currently occupied by}, aktuell von {2} besetzt.
building.village.owner: Dieses Dorf gehört keinem Stamm an.
building.ability.attract: attracts a wild animal to a nearby forest tile every 3 turns
building.produce.multiply.polaris: ({0} for every {1} frozen tiles in the world)
building.produce.multiply2.polaris: Produces {0} for every {1} frozen tiles in the world
building.produce.multiply2: produces {0} for each nearby {1} each turn
building.resource: adds a {0} at the selected tile
building.ability.embark: Units that move here will turn into boats that can move on water.
building.ability.route: It creates trade routes through {0} to any other {1} within a 5 tiles radius.
building.ability.road: Build roads to connect cities with the capital. Connected cities get 1 population as a reward. Roads also give a movement bonus for all units.
building.ability.ruin: A ruin from an ancient civilization, it can contain valuable things! Go there with a unit to examine it.
building.ability.patina: {0} grows over time, so try to build them as early as possible.
building.ability.limited: You can only build one {0} per city.
building.restriction.near: Must be built next to a {0}.
building.restriction.on: Must be on a tile with {0}.
actionbox.unit.toomany.info: This city can't support any more units. Upgrade the city to get more space for units.
actionbox.building.requiredtech: You need to research {0} to do this, tap the 'Tech Tree' button.
actionbox.insufficientfunds: You don't have enough stars to buy this. Tap 'next turn' to get more stars.
actionbox.confirm.info: Are you sure you want to do this?
tooltip.tile.road: Build a road to connect this city to your capital.
tooltip.tile.limit: This city cannot support any more units.
tooltip.tile.capture.enemy: Your city is being captured by the enemy!
tooltip.tile.capture.tip: Move a unit here to capture this city!
tooltip.tile.level.polaris: Freeze {0} more tiles to reach the next level
tooltip.tile.sailing: Move a unit here to start sailing!
tooltip.tile.monuments: Monuments gives your empire extra score!
tooltip.tile.ruin: Move a unit here and examine these ancient ruins.
tooltip.tile.blocked: This resource is blocked by an enemy unit
tooltip.tile.extract.upgrade: Extract this resource to upgrade your city
tooltip.tile.extract.convert: This resource can be transformed into a unit
tooltip.tile.extract.stars: Extract this resource to earn stars instantly
tooltip.tile.extract.research: You need to research {0} to extract this resource
tooltip.tile.outside: This resource is outside of your empire
tooltip.tile.research: You need to research {0} to be able to move here
tooltip.tile.explore: Explore this area to see what it holds!
tooltip.unit.city.capture: Tap 'Capture' to add this city to your empire
tooltip.unit.city.capture.next: This city will be ready to capture next turn
tooltip.unit.actions.none: No actions left. Press 'Next Turn' to move this unit again.
tooltip.unit.actions.move: Click a blue mark to move.
tooltip.unit.actions.attack: Click a red mark to attack!
tooltip.unit.enemy.territory: This enemy is in your territory!
tooltip.unit.enemy.city: This enemy is capturing your city!
tooltip.unit.grow.now: Will grow to {0} at the end of this turn!
tooltip.unit.decay.now: This unit will dissolve at the end of this turn.
tooltip.unit.decay.later: This unit will dissolve in {0} turns.
tooltip.ability.disband: Remove any of your own units and get half of its cost in return.
tooltip.ability.destroy: Remove any building within your borders, great for reconstructing your empire.
tooltip.ability.literacy: Reduce the price of all technologies by 20%.
tooltip.ability.glide: All non skating units get an extra move when moving on ice.
tooltip.ability.dash: This unit can attack after moving if there is an enemy in range.
tooltip.ability.convert: This unit can convert an enemy to your own tribe by attacking it.
tooltip.ability.escape: This unit can move again after attacking.
tooltip.ability.persist: This unit can keep attacking as long as it completely kills its victims.
tooltip.ability.swim: This unit is amphibious and can move on both land and water.
tooltip.ability.carry: This unit is carrying another unit inside.
tooltip.ability.heal: This unit can heal surrounding units.
tooltip.ability.navigate: This unit can move in any terrain even if you do not have the tech needed to move there.
tooltip.ability.fly: This unit can fly over any terrain with no movement penalties or bonuses.
tooltip.ability.splash: This unit causes splash damage to nearby units when attacking.
tooltip.ability.grow: This unit will eventually grow and become something else.
tooltip.ability.sneak: This unit can move past enemy units without stopping.
tooltip.ability.scout: This unit has double vision range.
tooltip.ability.freeze: This unit freezes its enemies when attacking them so they cannot move.
tooltip.ability.freeze_area: This unit can freeze the surrounding tiles including any enemy units.
tooltip.ability.freeze_auto: This unit freezes any surrounding tiles and units when moving.
tooltip.ability.skate: This unit gets double movement on ice tiles but on land their movement is limited to 1 tile and all other abilities are disabled.
tooltip.ability.fortify: This unit gets a defence bonus when defending in its own cities, double bonus with a city wall.

consent.enabled.info: You currently allow Polytopia to access some personal data to improve service and store your high scores etc. For more info, read our privacy policy.
consent.disabled.info: To save personal data like high scores and usage statistics we need you approval. For more info, read our privacy policy.
onlineview.title: MULTIPLAYER
onlineview.profile.available: Dein Profil ist offline nicht verfügbar.
onlineview.servicedisabled: Die Multiplayer-Server sind vorübergehend deaktiviert. Stelle sicher, dass Polytopia auf dem neusten Stand ist und versuche es später erneut.
onlineview.loaderror: Verbindung zum Multiplayer-Server fehlgeschlagen. Überprüfe deine Internetverbindung und versuche es erneut.
onlineview.uptodate: Alle Gefechte sind auf dem neusten Stand.
onlineview.intro.fix:
Hi {0}! 

Um online mit deinen Freunden zu spielen, fehlen einige Dinge:
onlineview.intro.update: Aktualisiere Polytopia, um an Onlinegefechten teilzunehmen.
onlineview.nogames.start: Let's get some online games going with your friends. Tap 'New game' to start one.
onlineview.nogames.first: Verbinde dich als erstes mit deinen Freunden, um Polytopia mit ihnen zu spielen. Tippe auf 'Freunde', um sie hinzuzufügen.
onlineview.passplay.start: Um ein lokales Pass & Play Spiel zu starten, tippe auf 'Neues Spiel'
onlineview.login.ios.info: Using {0} ensures that you have a unique and persistent Player ID that will keep your data safe across devices.
onlineview.notifications.info: Um den aktuellen Status deiner Onlinegefechte dir anzuzeigen werden Push-Benachrichtigungen verwendet.
onlineview.purchase.info: Um die Serverkosten decken zu können, musst du einen kostenpflichtigen Stamm erwerben.
onlineview.clipboard: Spiel ID wurde in die Zwischenablage kopiert: {0}
onlineview.clipboard.title: VoilÃ !
onlineview.game.resign.title: Resign
onlineview.game.resign.info: Möchtest du wirklich das Spiel verlassen? Du kannst dem Spiel nicht mehr beitreten.
onlineview.game.old.title: Alte Dateiversion
onlineview.game.old.info: Dieses Spiel wurde in einer veralteten Version erstellt. Leider kann dein Spielstand nicht mehr geladen werden. Bitte entferne das Spiel wieder und starte ein neues. Wir bitten, dies zu entschuldigen.

friendlist.new.myself.info: Du wolltest dich ernsthaft selbst hinzufügen? Du musst schon ganz toll sein...wie willst du gegen die selber spielen? Was machst du bei Twister? Oder Monopoly? Füge einfach eine Spieler ID von jemand anderem ein!
